additionalNotes:
Nicaraguan tobacco helped Oliva survive. The cigar that brought it to 
Flor de Oliva are crafted from Oliva's Nicaraguan long-leaf tobaccos which undergo a meticulous aging process, which gives you a flavourful, rich and cream blend without the bite.
